title: Summer School info
description:
https://schoolweb.tdsb.on.ca/elearning/e-Summer-Program 
Please, go through the FAQ, you will find all the necessary info there.

title: Registration
description:
i. There are July and August session of summer school take place every year. You will find the important dates and registration procedure on the website. 
ii. TDSB student will login to https://ereg.tdsb.on.ca/ with their regular student credential. 
iii. For none-TDSB, you will find steps on the website.

title: Course Withdrawal Form
description:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfX1qiDg3AXjlYl_0w8Cc82GCVc-GdAv9FkgQZqOTTHp014pQ/viewform 
i. Student has to drop before 'full disclosure date', otherwise it will appear on their transcript as dropped.

title: Report Card
description:
i. e-Summer report cards will be sent to student's TDSB email address. 
ii. Before receiving the report card student will receive two emails, one with the online location of the report card and a second email with the password information to access the report card. 
iii. It is essential that student has access to their TDSB email account.
